metadata.title: EVOS Post-Treatment Assessment Beachwalk

creators.name: Alaska Department of Environmental Conservation, Exxon Valdez Oil Spill Restoration Office

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  Data set produced from the first post-treatment beach survey conducted by ADEC to assess the shoreline condition after 1989 summer cleanup operations. Data is referenced to beach segments and includes degree and type of oiling, oil penetration, and biological data observed to include birds, mammals, intertidal barnacles).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Unknown

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Data is to be shared among public agencies and the public, although allowances are made for confidentiality prior to publication of findings.

Use constraints: Beach segment/subdivision numbering system has been modified over the course of data collection. Knowledge of this system is necessary for accurate interpretation of this data.
